title: What Can South Africa Learn from International Open Finance Initiatives? - International Banker
content: What Can South Africa Learn from International Open Finance Initiatives?  International Banker
description: Open finance, allowing third parties to access consumer data to finetune products and services, is becoming a serious discussion topic in South Africa but has some way to go to full implementation. As countries such as the UK and Australia refine their mature frameworks, South Africa is watching and learning as it hones its own initiative.
